message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.context.annotation.EnableAspectJAutoProxy'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.context.annotation.EnableAspectJAutoProxy'.
First sentence of Javadoc is incomplete (period is missing) or not present.
